meanings.definition: A hairstyle in which the hair is arranged on top of the head.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful updos for her wedding day.
meanings.sent2: Many brides choose elegant updos for their special day.
meanings.sent3: The updos she tried looked like a crown on her head.
meanings.sent4: Her updos was a tower of hair, reaching for the sky.
meanings.sent5: The updos she had was so intricate, it seemed like a work of art.

meanings.definition: The act of arranging the hair on top of the head.
meanings.sent1: Her skillful updos impressed everyone at the party.
meanings.sent2: She learned how to do updos by watching online tutorials.
meanings.sent3: The updos she attempted ended up looking like a messy bun.
meanings.sent4: His updos technique was like a magician's trick, transforming her look.
meanings.sent5: The updos she created was a masterpiece of hair styling.
